content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.football_score_api: Get football live scores for today be it any match The scores are divided based on the league and you can fetch the data for all the leagues This also gives you flexibility to know and find the matches and scores between teams for any other given date as well

I need to know the scores of the football matches played on last world cup final date
Begin!

Thought: To find the scores of football matches on the date of the last World Cup final, I'll first recall that the 2022 FIFA World Cup final was on December 18, 2022. I'll use the football scores API to retrieve the matches and scores for that specific date.

Thought: It seems there might be no other matches recorded for that specific date, which makes sense as the World Cup final was the main event. However, I want to ensure I provide a comprehensive answer to the user.

The 2022 FIFA World Cup final was between Argentina and France, with Argentina winning in a thrilling penalty shootout after a 3-3 draw in regular and extra time. However, the API didn't return any additional match details.

function.arguments: {"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "On December 18, 2022 (the date of the World Cup final), the main match was the FIFA World Cup Final between Argentina and France. Argentina won the match in a penalty shootout after an exciting 3-3 draw in regular and extra time. No other football matches were recorded on this specific date according to the available data."}
function.name: Finish
